message: Hey Bob, since the money will devalue more for you in the next rounds, I believe a fair start would be me getting $6000 and you $4000. It ensures we both get a good amount right away.
I'd like to propose a more even split.  Since the money devalues faster for me, I'll take a slightly smaller share to ensure we both get a decent amount and avoid further losses.
Bob, considering the devaluation rate affecting you, I'll propose $5500 for myself and $4500 for you this round. It balances out with the devaluation and gives us both a timely resolution.
